sections.purpose: To measure spontaneous motor activity using an Actophotometer.
sections.scope: Applicable to screening of central nervous system activity in Pharmacology laboratory.
procedure: Ensure the actophotometer chamber is clean.
Switch ON the instrument and allow stabilization.
Place the animal inside the chamber.
Start the instrument and record activity counts.
After completion, remove the animal safely.
sections.precautions: Clean the chamber after each use. Handle animals ethically.
